name: Escape Board Puzzle
description:
This will be a great escape. Of course if you can!

An escape puzzle game which you try to escape from the board by finding open paths.
On the board you can face bombs or closed paths. Also you can face teleport points,
the darkness points or c4 bombs. You need to find out the exit point with this mechanichs.
Can you find the exit by finding hidden paths?

Perfect for players who love new games breakout like games like reasoning mind puzzles, logical test, brain games and other things useful for your deductions , mind and decision skills. Escape games for free!
